participant_1.name: Dr. Emily Carter

participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.

participant_2.background: i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i don't like chicken.
